sentence: If the vehicle is stolen or untraceable for a period of thirty days, it shall constitute a default
label: TERM

sentence: For computation of time periods, the words from or commencing on shall include the specified date, while to, until or ending on shall exclude the specified date
label: TERM

sentence: For agricultural advances, the account shall be treated as non-performing if overdue for two crop seasons for short duration crops or one crop season for long duration crops
label: TERM

sentence: A grace period shall be applicable for payment before default is determined
label: TERM

sentence: A 5 day grace period shall apply to monthly instalments
label: TERM

sentence: A grace period of 10 days shall apply for payment before late charges are applied
label: TERM

sentence: The bank shall exercise the right to recall the loan by issuing a written notice to the borrower and the guarantor, if any
label: TERM

sentence: If the vehicle is not delivered or registered at signing, the particulars shall be informed to the bank within seven days of delivery or registration, whichever is earlier
label: TERM

sentence: The bank may grant permission for use of the vehicle for a specific period of time or for a specific destination outside the state
label: TERM

sentence: The bank shall return the repossessed vehicle within seven days from the date of realization of the entire outstanding dues
label: TERM

sentence: Overdue accounts shall be classified into buckets based on the number of days past due such as up to 30 days, 30 to 60 days and 60 to 90 days
label: TERM

sentence: A term loan shall be treated as a non-performing asset if interest or principal remains overdue for a period of more than 90 days
label: TERM

sentence: An overdraft or cash credit account shall be treated as non-performing if it remains out of order as per the applicable criteria
label: TERM

sentence: Bills purchased or discounted shall be treated as non-performing if they remain overdue for more than 90 days
label: TERM

sentence: Any change in residential address, employment or the place where the vehicle is normally kept shall be intimated to the bank within ten days of such change

sentence: A moratorium period of the specified number of months shall apply from the date of first disbursement if applicable

label: MILEAGE

sentence: Any unused mileage allowance shall not be refunded, adjusted or carried forward to any subsequent period
